postCreateCommand: pip install pros-cli && pushd $PWD && cd ~ && curl https://developer.arm.com/-/media/Files/downloads/gnu-rm/10.3-2021.10/gcc-arm-none-eabi-10.3-2021.10-x86_64-linux.tar.bz2?rev=78196d3461ba4c9089a67b5f33edf82a&hash=D484B37FF37D6FC3597EBE2877FB666A41D5253B -O && tar -xjvf gcc-arm-none-eabi-10.3-2021.10-x86_64-linux.tar.bz2 && echo "export PATH=$PATH:/home/codespace/gcc-arm-none-eabi-8-2019-q3-update/bin/" >> ~/.bashrc && popd
